name: LID - Psychological Horror RPG Gacha Simulator
name_original: LID - Psychological Horror RPG Gacha Simulator
description:
LID is a Psychological Horror RPG Gacha Simulator.

A free to play, no microtransaction RPG gacha simulator that not only collects "anime" characters but aims to develop them as characters and expand the world they live in.

Note : LID v6 is a test build. This version is only a prototype of the game.  There are balancing issues and possible game breaking bugs present.

Credits to all plugin creators featured in this game:

MAJOR PLUGINS :

MOGHunter, Galv, Yanfly, 

MINOR PLUGINS:

Kaus, HIME, Landazar, TamFey, FELSKI, DreamX, G.A.M Kertopermono.
